title: Good-Bye, My Lady
description: “Lost Dog: No one believed Skeeter when he said that the animal he heard laughing in the swamp was a dog. But when he and his Uncle Jesse tried to catch the animal, they discovered that was exactly what she was: a beautiful little dog Skeeter named Lady. Skeeter took lady home; he grew to love her and taught her to be the best hunting dog ever. But their short, close friendship was threatened when Skeeter got unexpected news about Lady - and had to make the hardest decision of his life!”
author: James H. Street
